name: bolt
description: A front-end toolkit of classes and evented behaviours.
author: @stephband

scripts.sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab -o classes classes && node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab -o components/grid components/grid
scripts.build: cat classes/normalise.css classes/root.css classes/body.css classes/index.css classes/button.css classes/thumb.css classes/bubble.css classes/input.css classes/label.css classes/table.css classes/block.css classes/flex.css classes/layer.css classes/text.css classes/color.css classes/modifiers.css classes/respond.css components/grid/grid.css components/dialog/dialog.css > dist/bolt.css && cp dist/bolt.css dist/bolt-2.0.0.css
